title: Quarks American Bento
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Gluten-free restaurant with focus on clean eating. Offers bento bowls, cabbage wraps, soup,  and riceballs which are all customizable with your choice of grain (quinoa, brown rice, white rice), variety of chopped veggies, superseeds blend (chia, hemp, sesame), and sauce. Three sauces are vegan: spicy peanut, ginger lemongrass, sweet chili. Veggies are sourced from local growers.
